Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration

  • Packages that use PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power
    Provides power-aware VmAllocationPolicy implementations.

    • Uses of PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power

      Subinterfaces of PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThreshold
      An interface to be implemented by Power-aware VM allocation policies that use a dynamic over utilization threshold computed using some statistical method such as Median absolute deviation (MAD), InterQuartileRange (IRQ), Local Regression, etc, depending on the implementing class.
      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power that implement PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
      An abstract power-aware VM allocation policy that dynamically optimizes the VM allocation (placement) using migration.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThresholdAbstract
      An abstract class that is the base for implementation of Power-aware VM allocation policies that use a dynamic over utilization threshold.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationInterQuartileRange
      A VM allocation policy that uses Inter Quartile Range (IQR) to compute a dynamic threshold in order to detect host over utilization.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression
      A VM allocation policy that uses Local Regression (LR) to predict host utilization (load) and define if a host is overloaded or not.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegressionRobust
      A VM allocation policy that uses Local Regression Robust (LRR) to predict host utilization (load) and define if a host is overloaded or not.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationMedianAbsoluteDeviation
      A VM allocation policy that uses Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) to compute a dynamic threshold in order to detect host over utilization.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationStaticThreshold
      A VM allocation policy that uses a static CPU utilization threshold to detect host over utilization.
      class  PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationWorstFitStaticThreshold
      A VmAllocationPolicy that uses a Static CPU utilization Threshold (THR) to detect host under and PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationStaticThreshold.getOverUtilizationThreshold(PowerHost) over} utilization.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power declared as PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration.NULL
      An attribute that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration objects.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power that return PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThresholdAbstract.getFallbackVmAllocationPolicy() 
      PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThreshold.getFallbackVmAllocationPolicy()
      Gets the fallback VM allocation policy to be used when the over utilization host detection doesn't have data to be computed.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power with parameters of type PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThresholdAbstract.setFallbackVmAllocationPolicy(PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration fallbackVmAllocationPolicy) 
      void PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThreshold.setFallbackVmAllocationPolicy(PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration fallbackVmAllocationPolicy)
      Sets the fallback VM allocation policy to be used when the over utilization host detection doesn't have data to be computed.
      Constructors in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power with parameters of type PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThresholdAbstract(PowerVmSelectionPolicy vmSelectionPolicy, double safetyParameter, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration fallbackVmAllocationPolicy)
      Creates a PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThreshold.
      PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationInterQuartileRange(PowerVmSelectionPolicy vmSelectionPolicy, double safetyParameter, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration fallbackVmAllocationPolicy)
      Creates a PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationInterQuartileRange.

      Creates a PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression.

      Creates a PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegressionRobust.
